CustomField.description: Defines the Frequency Pay Code Cap that applies to the Breakpoint based on the Timesheet Frequency. This field is automatically populated when a Pay Code Cap applies to the Pay Code used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the Frequency Pay Code Cap that applies to the Breakpoint based on the Timesheet Frequency. This field is automatically populated when a Pay Code Cap applies to the Pay Code used.Defines the Frequency Pay Code Cap that applies to the Breakpoint ba
CustomField.label: Frequency Pay Code Cap Record
CustomField.relationshipLabel: Interpretation Breakpoints with Frequency Pay Code Cap
